duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service and maintain a customer-first mentality at all times
Lead and mentor PT Store Supervisors and Sales Associates in areas of customer service, sales, cash management, inventory, and customer follow-up
Drive top-line sales and manage controllable contribution, spending at least 60% of the shift performing Leader on Duty tasks
Educate and provide feedback to PT Store Supervisors and Sales Associates on increasing sales through service standards, product knowledge, store presentation, and replenishment
Facilitate new hire onboarding and training for various skill levels
Support daily merchandising, styling, floor set planning and execution, replenishment, launches, updates, shipment, zero selling reports, loss prevention, and service
Ensure floor is replenished per company guidelines and ensure service, merchandising, and operational standards are met through company-defined practices and processes
Evaluate customer surveys and execute action plans to enhance the customer's in-store experience
Adapt to a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities, setting the tone and standards for customer satisfaction

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent. College degree and/or relevant retail work experience preferred
